definition.de: Strafe die mit Geld abgegolten wird
definition.dk: En straf, hvor den dømte skal betale et beløb.
definition.en-GB: Money that a court of law or other authority decides has to be paid as punishment for a crime or other offence
definition.en-US: Money that a court of law or other authority decides has to be paid as punishment for a crime or other offence
definition.se: En påföljd som innebär att den som fällts får betala en summa pengar.
